Command.Name: Replace Vehicles
Command.Title: Installing replace vehicles.
Command.Description: **All replace vehicles (such as 'police2') should be installed in the following path:**\nGTAV/mods/update/x64/dlcpacks/patch2025_01/dlc.rpf/x64/levels/gta5/vehicles.rpf/

Field.Name: Video Tutorials
Field.Value: Watch this [video guide](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SAGIisHY5gc) on installing replace vehicles.
